CustomField.description: This field is used in order to display the PA Shipping Address on the Opp PL. Note: To be removed as soon as the PA component on the the Opp PL is functional.
CustomField.formula: Account.PersonContact.MailingStreet & " " & Account.PersonContact.MailingCity & " " & TEXT( Account.PersonContact.MailingStateCode ) & " " & Account.PersonContact.MailingPostalCode & " " & TEXT( Account.PersonContact.MailingCountryCode )
CustomField.label: Address
